mapper.select: insert into ordertable(count, address, state, spID, cID, sum) values(#{count}, #{address}, #{state}, #{spID}, #{cID}, #{sum})

select oID, ordertable.count as count, submitTime, ordertable.address as recvAddress, state, ordertable.spID as spID, specialty.name as spName, picUrl, detail, category, seller.sID as sID, seller.name as sName, seller.phone as sPhone, seller.address as sAddress, ordertable.cID as cID, customer.name as cName, customer.phone as cPhone, ordertable.sum as sumPrice from ordertable, specialty, seller, customer where ordertable.spID=specialty.spID and ordertable.cID=customer.cID and seller.sID=specialty.sID and ordertable.cID=#{cID}

select oID, ordertable.count as count, submitTime, ordertable.address as recvAddress, state, ordertable.spID as spID, specialty.name as spName, picUrl, detail, category, seller.sID as sID, seller.name as sName, seller.phone as sPhone, seller.address as sAddress, ordertable.cID as cID, customer.name as cName, customer.phone as cPhone, ordertable.sum as sumPrice from ordertable, specialty, seller, customer where ordertable.spID=specialty.spID and ordertable.cID=customer.cID and seller.sID=specialty.sID and seller.sID=#{sID}
update ordertable set state=#{state} where oID=#{oID}
